text: Yuri Yurovsky () was a Soviet actor. People's Artist of the USSR. == Selected filmography == * 1949 — Encounter at the Elbe * 1950 — Zhukovsky * 1952 — The Composer Glinka ==References== == External links == * Юрий Юровский on kino- teatr.ru * Category:Soviet male film actors
